strapiPost.title: Tootsie Takes The Stage Next Week At Walton Arts Center
strapiPost.content:
The comedy-musical Tootsie is taking the stage at Walton Arts Center next week, providing eight chances to laugh your face off between Jan 17-22.

  • Tootsie role: This laugh-out-loud love letter to the theater tells the story of Michael Dorsey, a talented but difficult actor who struggles to find work until one show-stopping act of desperation lands him the role of a lifetime.
  • Rave reviews: Come experience this fresh new take on the 1982 film and see why it's being called a "musical comedy heaven" by Rolling Stone and "the most uproarious new musical in years!" by The Hollywood Reporter. 

Tickets start at $41. Get yours HERE.
